blogPost.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
blogPost.body: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
blogPost.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes
blogPost.author: Ayoub Moustaid

localize.description: 停止花费大量时间在多个部门(包括IT、商业、人力资源、法律、医疗、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文档。使用Fastdok生成即用型文档，只需回答几个问题，即可在几分钟内完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需几分钟即可工作的文档

localize.description: 停止花費大量時間在多個部門(包括IT、商業、人力資源、法律、醫療、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文檔。使用Fastdok生成即用型文檔，只需回答幾個問題，即可在幾分鐘內完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需幾分鐘即可工作的文檔

next.excerpt: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life — all over email. ⠀ Get started at letterloop.co
next.title: Letterloop - Create group newsletters with friends and family. ✍️

localize.description: Letterloop允许您与朋友和家人创建私人群组时事通讯。与生活中最重要的人保持联系，拉近距离，通过电子邮件发现你从来不知道的事情。⠀入门网址为letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 与朋友和家人一起创建群组时事通讯。✍️
